DataElement.preferredName: Legal Or Other Guardian Specify Individuals Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Pertains to which individual or relative being referred to as legal guardian or other guardian.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: To meet the requirements under law; not in violation of law or anything related to the law._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._An individual who is authorized under applicable State or local law to consent on behalf of a child or incapable person to general medical care including participation in clinical research._Be specific about something; define clearly.
